name: YouTube Centering (Dec 2012)
description: A small but effective layout edit of YouTube's newest layout; all this does is centering the front page and video page content (since I somehow can't get the new layout on my account, I had to log out and play around with it, so I don't know how it looks in your likes/favorites/watch later playlists).
